name: Cabela's Sportsman's Challenge
description: From the Head Games Sportsman's Series with Cabela's, the world's foremost outfitter, comes Sportsman's Challenge. Experience the most realistic & accurate shotgun sporting simulation ever! So real you can smell the powder. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned veteran, Sportsman's Challenge has all the different aspects of Trap, Skeet and Sporting Clays to help hone your skills for that next weekend outing. So grab the shells and steady your hand, it's time for the Sportsman's Challenge.
